description:
Just completed designer renovation. 
Quiet tree lined block. Convenient transportation. 
1 Bedroom
1 Bathroom
Open floor layout
Exposed brick
Large closet
Accommodates 2

Easy access to Manhattan, Williamsburg and Bushwick
A/C trains, local and express stops, G train
Buses around the corner
CitiBike station across the street
Saraghina, Peaches, Eugene's, Brew, L'Antagoniste,  new bars and cafes

No pets
No smoking
No shoes
No parties
Not suitable for kids

Renovation has just been done. It is fully equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay, from kitchen utensils, cookware etc. to bathroom supplies and nice bedding etc. 
Faces south and gets great sun throughout the day.  
The feeling is cosy and light-filled. 
The neighborhood is friendly and quiet.

I live in the building and will meet you. I will also be happy to help, give advice and suggestions.

Bedford-Stuyvesant nudges up against ultra-hip Williamsburg. A historic neighborhood that boasts pristine brownstones and tree-lined quiet blocks. Generations-old Bed-Stuy residents share the streets with newcomers and hip kids. Many new restaurants, bars and cafes increasingly join its cadre of locally-owned businesses.
Our building is located in the more charming and gentrified section, in close proximity to the subway line and walkable distance to Ft. Green and Clinton Hill neighborhoods.

A and C trains are close by for easy access to Manhattan. 
G train is 12 mins walk and will take you to Williamsburg and Greenpoint. 
CitiBike station is right on the corner and buses are nearby.
Buses around the corner.
name: Charming sunlit space in prime Bedford Stuyvesant
